## Analysis of distribution fitting for multiple empirical protein alignments

This RMarkdown document repeats the fitting procedures for 10 empirical protein alignments and produces Figure 4. It serves the same purpose as simulated_protein_all.Rmd, but for empirical protein alignments.

```{r, message=FALSE}
# load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(Biostrings)
library(stringr)
library(cowplot)
library(broom)
library(ggtext)
theme_set(theme_cowplot())
```
